summary: This is an email chain from April 2020 between attorneys from Kaplan Hecker & Fink LLP and an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) from the Southern District of New York. The attorneys are following up on a formal request for information from the DOJ relating to Jeffrey Epstein, made in connection with pending litigation against his estate. The AUSA indicates they will provide an update soon.
